verses.verse: When <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> [there was] <S%H7578>trembling.<s%> He <S%H5375>exalted<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> But through <S%H1168>Baal<s%> he <S%H816>did<s%> <S%H816>wrong<s%> and <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> they <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> and <S%H3254>more,<s%> And <S%H6213>make<s%> for themselves <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>images,<s%> <S%H6091>Idols<s%> <S%H8394>skillfully<s%> made from their <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> of them the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2796>craftsmen.<s%> They <S%H559>say<s%> of them, "Let the <S%H120>men<s%> who <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5401>kiss<s%> the <S%H5695>calves!<s%>"

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> they will be like the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> And like <S%H2919>dew<s%> which <S%H7925>soon<s%> <S%H1980>disappears,<s%> Like <S%H4671>chaff<s%> which is <S%H5590>blown<s%> <S%H5590>away<s%> from the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor,<s%> And like <S%H6227>smoke<s%> from a <S%H699>chimney.<s%>

Yet I [have been] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4480>Since<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> And you were not to <S%H3045>know<s%> any <S%H430>god<s%> <S%H2108>except<s%> Me, For <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3467>savior<s%> <S%H1115>besides<s%> Me.
I <S%H3045>cared<s%> for you in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> In the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8514>drought.<s%>

As [they had] their <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> they <S%H7646>became<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> And <S%H7646>being<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7311>became<s%> <S%H7311>proud;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7911>forgot<s%> Me.
So I will be <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H7826>lion<s%> to them; Like a <S%H5246>leopard<s%> I will <S%H7789>lie<s%> in <S%H7789>wait<s%> by the <S%H1870>wayside.<s%>

I will <S%H6298>encounter<s%> them like a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H9599>robbed<s%> of her <S%H9599>cubs,<s%> And I will <S%H7167>tear<s%> open their <S%H5458>chests<s%><S%H3820>;<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> I will also <S%H398>devour<s%> them like a <S%H3833>lioness,<s%> [As] a <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beast<s%> would <S%H1234>tear<s%> them.
[It is] your <S%H7843>destruction,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> That [you are] against Me, against your <S%H5828>help.<s%>

<S%H165>Where<s%> <S%H645>now<s%> is your <S%H4428>king<s%> That he may <S%H3467>save<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5892>cities,<s%> And your <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H559>requested,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> me a <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%>"?
I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you a <S%H4428>king<s%> in My <S%H639>anger,<s%> And <S%H3947>took<s%> him away in My <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
The <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is <S%H9503>bound<s%> up; His <S%H9128>sin<s%> is <S%H6845>stored<s%> up.

The <S%H2256>pains<s%> of <S%H3205>childbirth<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon him; He is not a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> For it is not the <S%H6256>time<s%> that he should <S%H5975>delay<s%> at the <S%H4866>opening<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of the <S%H4866>womb.<s%>

Shall I <S%H6299>ransom<s%> them from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>? Shall I <S%H1350>redeem<s%> them from <S%H4194>death<s%>? O <S%H4194>Death,<s%> <S%H165>where<s%> are your <S%H1698>thorns<s%>? O <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> <S%H165>where<s%> is your <S%H6986>sting<s%>? <S%H5164>Compassion<s%> will be <S%H5641>hidden<s%> from My <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

<S%H3558>Though<s%> he <S%H6509>flourishes<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H260>reeds,<s%> An <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6921>wind<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> The <S%H7307>wind<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5927>coming<s%> up from the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> And his <S%H4726>fountain<s%> will <S%H954>become<s%> <S%H954>dry,<s%> And his <S%H4599>spring<s%> will be <S%H9162>dried<s%> up; It will <S%H8154>plunder<s%> [his] <S%H214>treasury<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2532>precious<s%> <S%H3627>article.<s%>

<S%H8111>Samaria<s%> will be <S%H816>held<s%> <S%H816>guilty,<s%> For she has <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against her <S%H430>God.<s%> They will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> Their <S%H5768>little<s%> <S%H5768>ones<s%> will be <S%H7376>dashed<s%> in <S%H7376>pieces,<s%> And their <S%H9099>pregnant<s%> <S%H2030>women<s%> will be <S%H1234>ripped<s%> <S%H1234>open.<s%>
